posts.title: Smart Food Scale
posts.content: Get on the fast track to healthy eating by employing the services of the smart food scale. With this app and scale combo you’ll be able to see the carbs, proteins, calories, and micronutrients in all of your meals so you can create the perfect balanced diet.

posts.title: Rainbow Light Projector
posts.content: Project an awe inspiring double rainbow anywhere in your home with this rainbow light projector. Perfect for brightening up a kid’s room with a beautiful display of colors, the rainbow light projector will have your children crying tears of joy.

posts.title: Hot Sauce Roulette
posts.content: Put your spice tolerance to the ultimate test by trying to best everyone in a game of hot sauce roulette. The roulette styled design of the box holds 12 small bottles filled with hot sauces ranging from mild to extremely hot like the Ghost Pepper and Carolina Reaper.

posts.title: Iron Man Mouse
posts.content: Give your PC setup a cool comic book feel by using this Iron Man mouse. Designed to look like Iron Man’s iconic mask, the eyes light up when the mouse is in use and it features a convenient standby mode to save power when not in use.

posts.title: Flavored Bacon Jerky
posts.content: Get your fill of protein and flavor by snacking on this incredibly delicious flavored bacon jerky. Available in either a two or four-pack, this low calorie snack is a made with 100% real bacon and is available in mouth-watering flavors like maple and sriracha.

posts.title: Cavity Fighting Lollipops
posts.content: Getting the kids to practice responsible dental hygiene is easier than ever thanks to these cavity fighting lollipops. Each treat is made from all natural sugarless ingredients along with Cavibloc extract that reduces the amount of bacteria in your mouth.

posts.title: Temperature Controllable Coffee Mug
posts.content: Cold coffee will become a thing of past once you begin carrying around this temperature controllable coffee mug. It utilizes a portable battery in combination with a heating element that can handle everything from heating your coffee to boiling water.

posts.title: Kaleidoscope Light Show Projector
posts.content: Instantly create a party atmosphere by switching on this kaleidoscope light show projector. It features three built-in LEDs that shine through the multifaceted plastic top to project an awe inspiring kaleidoscopic effect on your walls and ceilings.

posts.title: Star Wars Cookbook
posts.content: Channel the Force in order to bake some of the most delicious treats in the galaxy with the Star Wars cookbook. With this unique cookbook in your capable hands, you’ll be able to uncover some of the galaxies best kept recipes, like Wookie cookies and Yoda soda.

posts.title: Checkers Shotglass Drinking Game
posts.content: Checkers was fun when you were a kid, but now that you’re all grown up you’ve probably wondered how you can still enjoy the game while still satisfying your drinking problem. The answer: shotglass checkers. Nothing gets a party going better than checkers and alcohol.

posts.title: Floating Cornhole Set
posts.content: Provide hours of wholesome entertainment for the entire family by bringing along the floating cornhole set. The game board features a fun colorful design that can be played on either water or dry land and includes six floating bean bags.

posts.title: Punderdome Card Game
posts.content: If you like Cards Against Humanity and clever wordplay, you’ll go nuts for the Punderdome card game. After drawing 2 prompt cards like “colors” and “minor injuries”, players will have 90 seconds to come up with as many dad-joke worthy puns as possible.
